A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All though not a bad popcorn movie  it did however loose  the feel of a starwars movie.The atempt at  sprinkling humor throughout the film made the scenes feel like a parody on a par with the 1987 movie spaceballs those scenes would of been better suited for  bluray in a deleted scene section as they came very close to mockery.there was also parts it felt they unnecessarily needed to explain or justify parts of the movie or characters.i got the impression that the writers read the reviews or had personal issues with the force awakens then thought ah we'll Address that in this movie\,why is kylo Ren  wearing a mask as one example it the  characters and storey lines of the previous starwars movies are weakened by watching this film
